section.p: provides one convenient access point to your monitoring data. Use Monitoring > Overview to keep track of your services and servers and quickly check their status. The overview also indicates any irregularities in the log data of the system components you are monitoring.
On the Overview page, you can:

li.p: View the status of your services, servers, and log data at a glance. As soon as you have defined an alarm for a service, a server, or log data, there is status information displayed on the Overview page. Different colors are used for the different statuses. This makes it is easy to instantly detect any problem.
